sentences.en: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.cn: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.en: A sharp white spot-light beamed down on a small stage.
sentences.cn: 聚光灯的强烈白光照在小舞台上。

sentences.en: A spot of rain fell on her hand.
sentences.cn: 一滴雨落在她的手上。

sentences.en: A sudden break in the cloud allowed rescuers to spot Michael Benson.
sentences.cn: 天气的突然放晴帮助救援人员找到了迈克尔·本森。

sentences.en: a white cat with brown spots
sentences.cn: 带褐色斑点的白猫

sentences.en: Even clever people are not terribly clever when put on the spot.
sentences.cn: 即便是聪明人在面对难题时也未必就能表现得特别聪明。

sentences.en: He wears a cap to cover a spot of baldness.
sentences.cn: 他戴帽以遮斑秃。

sentences.en: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.cn: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

sentences.en: I have a soft spot for London Zoo.
sentences.cn: 我特别喜欢伦敦动物园。

sentences.en: I spotted a police car behind us.
sentences.cn: 我发现有辆警车在我们后面。

sentences.en: It can be hard for even a trained doctor to spot the symptoms of lung cancer.
sentences.cn: 即使是训练有素的医生也很难看出肺癌的症状。

sentences.en: It's an isolated spot all right.
sentences.cn: 它确实是个偏僻的地方。

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is undoubtedly in a spot of bother.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生肯定遇到了点小麻烦。

sentences.en: the cup of coffee hit the spot.
sentences.cn: 这杯咖啡正合口味。

sentences.en: The prime minister has a blind spot on ethical issues.
sentences.cn: 这位首相无视道德问题。

sentences.en: The satellite remains in one spot relative to the earth's surface.
sentences.cn: 相对地球表面而言，这颗卫星位置固定。

sentences.en: These plants will grow happily in a sunny or partially shaded spot.
sentences.cn: 这些植物在阳光充足或有部分光线照射的地方长势良好。

sentences.en: They all stood there staring, as if frozen to the spot.
sentences.cn: 他们都站在那儿发愣，就像被冻在那里似的。

sentences.en: Vicenzo failed to spot the error.
sentences.cn: 维森佐没能发现这个错误。

sentences.en: Vince is having a spot of bother with the law.
sentences.cn: 文斯惹上了点儿官司。

sentences.en: We just stopped there, rooted to the spot.
sentences.cn: 我们一下子就停在了那里，呆若木鸡。

sentences.en: You can spot undercover cops a mile off.
sentences.cn: 你一眼就可以认出便衣警察。

words.tran_cn: 有斑点的；斑纹的；弄污的
发疹的；多斑点的；质量不一的
着弹点观察员；监视人；测位仪；检路器
发现（spot的过去分词）；玷污；弄上污痕
沾上污渍；散布；用点装饰（spot的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 黑斑；交通事故多发地段
（视网膜上的）盲点；（驾驶车辆等视力以外的）盲区；偏见；无知
n. 特点，显著之点；强放射性点
[生化]热点；过热点；潜在的危险地区
有压力的：在注意下或压力下；在有压力位置上
光斑尺寸；光斑大小；黑子大小

trans.tran_en: for buying or paying immediately, not at some future time
a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time
to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize
to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

trans.tran_cn: 认出， 发现； 玷污
trans.tran_en: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize
